channel.title: User Guide :: Unreal Metadata Editor Documentation
channel.description: Metadata Editor User Guide Itâ€™s main purpose is to make metadata editing simple and thus this guide also will be simple. Key information Editor can edit only one asset at a time. If multiple assets were selected, editor will open for the first one. Name of selected asset is always visible in top left side of the editor. Edit metadata of an asset Pick an asset of choice in Content Browser and Right Mouse Button on it.
